getOpts

public List<OptTuple> getOpts()
Description copied from interface: IQuestionResponse
Gets the list of answers the respondent provided for this question. For radio button questions, this will hold exactly one OptTuple. For checkbox questions, it will hold more than one.

Specified by:
getOpts in interface IQuestionResponse
Returns:
A list of OptTuples, corresponding to answer data.

getAnswer

public Component getAnswer()
                    throws SurveyException
Description copied from interface: IQuestionResponse
Convenience method for getting a single answer, if this question is marked exclusive (i.e., radio button).

Specified by:
getAnswer in interface IQuestionResponse
Returns:
The component corresponding to the respondent's answer.
Throws:

getAnswers
